channel.title: Add Vengance[Client Sided] [PI] base
channel.description: Well i downloaded a server called Exion. Camed packaged with server and client and i have no idea how to add veng client sided. I've searched around for tutorials but couldnt find one. I've added the altar but the server crashes evereytime i click it. Please help?

item.title: Add Vengance[Client Sided] [PI] base
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

OR you can make a venceance button in the regular spellbook
i will publish a guide on how to make it soon , here’s a pic of how it wil look:

it still requires runes to cast.
you can change " teleports to watchtower " text to anything else you want ( i made it show the required runes )
you can make it require magic lvls and def lvls.

however , adding the interface is eassier…
but it seems to confuse newcomers…

Read full topic
